Report technical issues or suggest new features
Hi!\nI\'ve got a bug to report or some feedback about how to improve this app:\n(For a bug report, please provide us with the details of the bug and the circumstances in which it happened)

# Welcome to Mood Patterns
This App helps you to collect information about how you feel.
Given the *personal* and *sensitive* nature of this data, we do our best to protect it.

- Mood Patterns does not send any data (it has **no Internet** permission)
- Data is **256-bit AES encrypted** on your device
- App access is protected by a **PIN**

Before you can use Mood Patterns you have to create your PIN.
In case of losing the PIN, it cannot be recovered and all data without backup will be lost as well.
Start and pause automatic survey prompts within the configured schedule.
Don\'t want to wait for the next sampling? No problem. Start a survey anytime you like!
An important event just happened? Add it for later analysis.
Have not set up a notification to input last night\'s sleep? Enter it directly from here.
Set the time-frames and the frequency of sampling.
Select the mood scales you\'d like to assess.

You have just started the mood sampling. At random times within your schedule, surveys will be prompted. Sampling will continue even if you close the app. Click Pause to stop sampling.

Note: If you are not receiving any prompts within your schedule, this is probably due to the power-saving configuration of your phone.
List of used open source libraries and their license information
Cannot delete a person who was already selected in a survey.
Cannot delete a place that was already selected in a survey.
Cannot delete an activity that was already selected in a survey.
Cannot delete a factor that was already selected in a survey.
Occasions of this event exist.\nDelete anyway?
Enable Pro features and help improving Mood Patterns by securing a constant supply of coffee for the developer.
Pro status is still active but will expire soon. Restore to keep using all Pro features (and support the developer with a coffee per month).
You can collect and export data of Pro Scales without Pro Status. However, in-app analysis of this data is only available to Pro users.
Even without Pro Status alerts for Pro Scales will work (you will be notified if the condition is met). However, in-app analysis of this data is only available to Pro users.
Amount of data loaded at start-up\n(smaller = faster)
Thanks to everybody who helped to improve this app
Help us by rating the app
Do you like Mood Patterns? Then please take a moment to rate it. Your feedback is very important to us!

Classical diaries are great, but they have one major flaw - they are subject to recall bias. Some activities in our lives are more salient than others. We remember them better and more vividly and therefore often believe that they take a larger part of each day than they do. However, for most of us, routines fill the largest part of our daily life and those are often overlooked in diaries.

To capture all parts of your life that matter Mood Patterns uses a technique of the social sciences: experience sampling. It never asks you to remember anything but records how you feel right at the moment.
Automatic daily data export to the device\'s internal storage
Go to the device\'s energy options?
Please wait.\nData will be loaded soon.
Associations between daily mood and your sleep in the following night
Associations between sleep and your mood the following day
Do you really want to permanently delete this value?
This event occasion is associated with a survey entry.\n Delete it anyway?
Please turn on sampling by clicking START SAMPLING on the start screen.
Diagnose potential problems that prevent automatic survey prompts.
Problems that might prevent prompts of automatic surveys

The automatic diagnosis tool did not find any problems.

Please be aware that sampling is random and that by chance even a whole day can go by without a survey prompt (although this is unlikely).

The most likely culprit is some extra energy saving measure implemented by the device\'s manufacturer. For more information on this please see dontkillmyapp.com.

Please contact us at contact@moodpatterns.info and we will work out a solution.

There have been automatic survey prompts, but they have timed out (you have probably missed them).

Notifications will be dismissed after 15 minutes by default so that there is no ambiguity between how you have felt when you first saw the notification and when you responded to it.

If you want the notification to stay active until you react to it, then you can change it at
Settings ( ⋮ ) -> Notifications: Auto cancel.
Notifications of Mood Patterns are blocked by system settings.\n\nPlease change this

Due to the set schedule, automatic surveys will be very infrequent.

You can enlarge the time frames and increase the sampling frequency at
Navigation drawer ( ☰ ) -> sampling settings -> schedule
Prompting automatic surveys is a long running service and therefore potentially aborted by energy saving options.\n\nTo prevent this from happening please add Mood Patterns

Here you can
 
|b|set the time-frames and the frequency of sampling,
 
|b|select the mood scales you'd like to assess, and
 
|b|select additional data you'd like to collect.
Select additional data (places, people, activities, and sleep) you\'d like to collect.

Here you can
 
|b|create,
 
|b|edit, and
 
|b|remove
 
additional data items.
Create, edit, and remove places.\n\nNote: only unused places can be removed

Create, edit, and remove activities.
They will be available both as primary and secondary activities.

Note: only unused activities can be removed
Create, edit, and remove persons.\n\nNote: only unused persons can be removed
Create, edit, and remove factors.\n\nNote: only unused factors can be removed
Create, edit, and remove events.\n\nCreate, edit, and remove event occasions.

In each category, you can |is|long click|ie| an item to start the |bs|multi-edit mode|be|.
 
In the |bs|multi-edit mode|be| you can
 
|b|edit attributes of multiple items and
 
|b|merge multiple items into one.

Here you can set when and how often your mood will be automatically sampled by
 
|b|creating,
 
|b|editing, and
 
|b|removing
 
sampling times.

Click to switch between
 
|b||bs|random|be| and
 
|b||bs|fixed|be|
 
schedule.

 
|is|Note|ie|: You can use either or both of them.

This is the default schedule because it provides the highest data quality.
 
Within each time-frame, every moment has the same chance of a survey without considering past surveys. 
In practice, this could mean that longer times go by without a survey, followed by times with frequent surveys. 
However, on average, there will be as many surveys as you have set.

Set fixed times for survey prompts.
 
To improve the representativity of the collected data, you can add a random period in which the survey will be prompted.
 
|is|Note|ie|: Due to Android's energy-saving settings, even surveys without a random period might be a little bit late.
Click on an existing sampling time to see its details.\n\nYou can edit the details or delete the whole sampling time.

Random and fixed schedule deal differently with overlapping sampling times.
 
|bs|Random|be|
 
|b|Overlapping time-frames with the same sampling frequency merge into a single time-frame.
 
|b|A new time-frame that overlaps a second time-frame with a different sampling frequency replaces the overlapping part of the second time-frame.
 
|bs|Fixed|be|
 
|b|Sampling times can partly or fully overlap one another.

|bs|Long click|be| on some empty space to
 
|b|add a new sampling time or
 
|b|clear the whole day.
Before you start, set up your data collection

At |bs|☰|be| -> |bs|Sampling settings|be| you can set your
 
|b|sampling schedule
 
and
 
|b|the mood scales and
 
|b|the additional data (places, persons, activities, sleep)
 
you would like to assess.

At |bs|☰|be| -> |bs|Edit additional data|be| you can add and edit
 
|b|places,
 
|b|persons,
 
|b|activities, and
 
|b|events.

 
|is|Note|ie|: You can also add new additional data items during a survey.

At settings ( |bs|⋮|be| ) you can, e.g.,
 
|b|change security or appearance settings,
 
|b|get help (diagnosis tool for missing survey prompts), and
 
|b|get more information about this app (e.g., data collection concept).

From here you can
 
|b|start a survey,
 
|b|record an event,
 
|b|start or pause automatic survey prompts, and
 
|b|go to settings.
This is just a link, no integration. NO DATA will be shared with FB. On our page, you can get the latest news and tips for Mood Patterns.
This will reset the scale and DELETE all of its entries.\n\nDo you want to proceed?

Click on any event to get more insights about it.

 
Besides the name
 
|b|the date of the last occasion,
 
|b|the count of occasions in the last 3 months, and
 
|b|the count of occasions in the last month
 
are shown.

The events are alphabetically sorted by default.

Click name to reverse the sort or to return to alphabetical sorting after another sorting type has been selected.
Sort by date of the last occasion
To sort the events by the date of the last occasion, click last.
Sort by number of occasions in the last 3 months
Click 3 M to sort the events by the number of occasions in the last 3 months.
Sort by number of occasions in the last month
Click 1 M to sort the events by the number of occasions in the last month.

The billing service is not reachable at the moment.

Please retry later.

Thank you!

Starting with Android 11, by default apps cannot see non-media data created by other apps.\n\nIf you want to import data NOT created by your current installation of Mood Patterns, then you first need to permit it to see all data.
Not able to save the alert.\nPlease try again.
Do you want to permanently remove this alert?
No event occurrences\nwithin the shown time-range
No sleep data\nwithin the shown time-range
No further scales\nwithin the shown time-range

This view helps you to explore and compare how you feel in different situations.
 
By default, it shows all entries within the given date range. This is the starting point to
 
|b||bs|filter|be| the shown entries based on the additional data and to
 
|b||bs|compare|be| filter selections.
Start by selecting the |is|scale|ie| you want to explore.
Click to change the date range.\n\nThe used data is limited to this selection.
Only entries at selected places are included.\n\nIf this filter is not activated, then all places are selected.
Only entries with at least one of the selected persons present are included. \n\nIf this filter is not activated, then entries are not filtered regarding the presence of persons.
Only entries with one of the selected primary activities are used.\n \nIf this filter is not activated, then entries are not filtered regarding the primary activity.
Only entries with one of the selected secondary activities are used.\n \nIf this filter is not activated, then entries are not filtered regarding the secondary activity.

Click to show the trajectory of the comparison selection.
 
To improve readability of the graph the trajectory of the comparison selection is displayed as a smoothed line, if possible.
 
By default this selection includes all entries in the given date range. The next steps will illustrate how this can be adjusted.
Click to use the current filter selection as comparison selection.
Click to see and edit the current comparison selection.
Click to reset the current comparison selection to all entries.
Please select the time of the entry.\n\nIs it right now or was it a specific moment in the past?
Please select the time of the event.\n\nIs it right now or was it a specific moment in the past?
Time will be displayed in 24 hours format.
Time will be displayed in 12 hours format.

Sorry, Google's license check failed. 
Mood Patterns is officially only available in Google's Play Store. 
If you have installed it from a different source, then please uninstall and reinstall it from there.
 
If the problem nonetheless remains, then please try: 
1. uninstalling Mood Patterns 
2. clearing storage and cache of the Google Play Store app 
3. (restart your device) [try it once without this step first] 
4. reinstalling Mood Patterns
 
Thank you!
The content of this view can either be shared as an image or as a spreadsheet.

This view provides aggregate statistics of the |is|Mood Scales|ie|.
 
The relative size of all numbers is color-coded to facilitate pattern recognition.
 
The view can be shared either as an image or as a spreadsheet (csv-file).

Select the aggregation unit of the statistics.
 
Available options are
 
|b|day
 
|b|week
 
|b|month
 
|b|year.

Indicates the average scale-value.
 
At least for non-custom scales, higher is usually better.
 
Calculated as |is|arithmetic mean|ie|.
Indicates how far entries on the scale are apart from one another.\n \nCalculated as |is|standard deviation|ie|.
Indicates how much the scale values change from one entry to the next.\n \nCalculated as the |is|mean absolute distance|ie| between consecutive values.
Indicates the number of entries used to calculate the statistics.\n \nThe greater the count is, the more reliable are the statistics.
Shift the start of the day from midnight
Instead of a dialog to decide between NOW and PAST, show a small extra button to enter past entries directly.
Select the activity that will be used for all entries
Select the place that will be used for all entries
Select the event that will be used for all entries
Select the person that will be used for all entries
Select the factor that will be used for all entries
Enables smart sorting of additional data in surveys. The preparation takes more time.
Only data of the currently selected scales and additional data will be exported.\n\nCSV exports cannot be re-imported.
Notification when the weekly report is available
What do you want to export?
Please grant permission to access the usage data to use this feature.
The collection of phone usage data was activated in the imported database. To use this feature, please grant usage permission.

Removing non-responses reduces the database size and speeds up queries. \n\nStatistics regarding the non-responses are planning (but not implemented yet). After the removal, they will not be available for the time before.
